text:
Reggie Joiner (born August 20, 1960), is the CEO and founder of Orange'", a division of The reThink Group, Inc. He is also one of the founders of North Point Community Church, where he served as the executive director of Family Ministry for 11 years.
Personal life.
Joiner lives in Cumming, Georgia, with his wife Debbie, where they raised four children into adulthood: Reggie Paul, Hannah, Sarah, and Rebekah.
